scripts.prepare: yarn gen-manifests && yarn codegen && yarn build
scripts.deploy-local: yarn graph deploy wow/subgraph --node https://deploy.stream.superhow.net --ipfs https://ipfs.stream.superhow.net --version-label 0.0.1 sepolia.subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn graph deploy --product hosted-service wealth-of-wisdom/subgraph-sepolia sepolia.subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn graph deploy --product hosted-service wealth-of-wisdom/subgraph-eth mainnet.subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one: yarn graph deploy --product hosted-service wealth-of-wisdom/subgraph-arbitrum-one arbitrum-one.subgraph.yaml
